title: League client stuck. Help.
body:
For my holidays, I travelled overseas with my family to Vietnam. In my free time, I was planning to get some practise for the pre-season. But I didn't want to play on Garena, so hey. I thought I could try the Japanese server, big mistake.

Now i'm stuck on the following screen, and can't log back in to my OCE account. Is there any possible way for me to revert this, without reinstalling the game?

replies.body:
When you hit what I can only assume is the OK button, and then the X in the client, is there an option to Sign Out (as opposed to just exit)?

Failing that, change the password for your Japan account and it should force a logout (which may or may not help depending on where in the startup this is).

If neither helps, then a reinstall or ticket to support (who will probably suggest you reinstall) is pretty much your only option.

> [{quoted}](name=Ninox,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=t7mNOmch,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2020-01-14T01:58:40.937+0000)
>
> When you hit what I can only assume is the OK button, and then the X in the client, is there an option to Sign Out (as opposed to just exit)?
> 
> Failing that, change the password for your Japan account and it should force a logout (which may or may not help depending on where in the startup this is).
> 
> If neither helps, then a reinstall or ticket to support (who will probably suggest you reinstall) is pretty much your only option.

Just had to restart my computer, thanks alot though :)
Ah the classic "turn it off and on again". Glad you got it fixed :)
